translations: 反面；书的左页；[印刷]封底

sentences.sentence: Verso can be used to practice vocabulary.
sentences.translation: 帮助你练习词汇的工具。

sentences.sentence: Please note that the verso of the card has to be white.
sentences.translation: 请注意卡的背面必须是白色的。

sentences.sentence: I prodotti esportati verso il Nord America, Europa, Asia e altri paesi e region i.
sentences.translation: 产品远销北美、欧洲、亚洲等多个国家和地区。
